title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync (1GILQD5)
OB: When exporting a directory (project) and placing the exported jar in the same directory (project), if the exported jar file is overwritten for the second time, an out of sync message is displayed.
EB: The out of sync message should not be displayed when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application.
2. Select a directory (project) to export.
3. Export the directory as a jar file.
4. Place the exported jar file in the same directory (project).
5. Overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
6. Observe if the out of sync message is displayed.
